Game Base.descricao: On hit, grants a 10% chance to return spent Ammo directly into the magazine of this weapon. Level 10: When Ammo is returned to this weapon, it gains 10% increased Fire Rate for 3s. Duration can increase up to 10s
Increases Weakspot Damage by 10% for every 400 Mod Power Spent by the attached weapon's mod. Max 3 Stacks. Lasts 10s. Level 10: At Max Stacks, gain 10% Critical Chance on Weakspot Hits.
Increases Fire Rate by 7% and an additional 1% for every 10% of Magazine missing. Level 10: Reload Speed is increased by 1.5% Reload Speed per 10% Magazine Missing (Max 30%)
Mod use increases Fire Rate of this weapon by 10% for 7s. Level 10: Increases Mod Generation of this weapon by 15%. Lasts 7s.
Continuously Aiming increases Ranged Damage by up to 10% over 3s. Level 10: Ranged Critical Hit Chance increased by 10%.
Increases Magazine Capacity of this weapon by 20%. Level 10: Increases Reload Speed of this weapon by 20% when reloading from empty.
Attached Mod deals 10% additional Mod Damage. Level 10: Attached Mod use gains a 15% chance to not consume charge.
Using this weapon's Mod generates 10% of single charge value as passive Mod Power over 10s. Does not stack. Level 10: Mod Damage generates 15% of damage dealt as Mod Power.
After 2 consecutive Weakspot Hits, increase the damage of the next Weakspot Hit by 20%. Level 10: Increases Weakspot Critical Chance by 15%.
Increases Mod Damage by 10%. Level 10: Generate 25% additional Mod Power for Stowed Weapon.
Switching to this weapon creates an Explosive Burst which deals 50 Damage to all enemies within 7m. Level 10: This weapon's kills with any Explosive Damage reduce Kill Switch cooldown by 1s
Reduces the Heat Generation of this weapon by 25%. Level 10: Reload Speed is increased up to 55% based on this weapon's Heat accumulation.
Increases this weapon's reload speed by 4% for base damage dealt between reloads. Lasts 7s. Max 5 Stacks. Level 10: Reloading this weapon at Max Stacks increases Ranged Damage by 20% for 15s.

When this weapon scores a Critical Hit, it increases Critical Chance and Critical Damage by 1.5% for 3s. Max 10 stacks. Level 10: Critical Hits from this weapon add 2 stacks. Increases duration by 2s.
Shots from this weapon have a 20% chance to return spent Ammo to reserves. Level 10: Refunded Ammo has a 25% chance to also be added to stowed weapon reserves.
This weapon's Charged Shots decrease the Charge time of Subsequent Charge Shots by 10% for 5s. Level 10: While active, Charged Primary Shots grant 1% Ranged Critical Chance per round spent. Max 15.
Reloading increases the damage of this weapon's next shot by 10%. Last 3s. Level 10: Increases reload Speed by 15%.
Reloading increases the damage of the Attached Mod by 25% for 5s Level 10: Casting Attached Mod increases Reload Speed by 25%. Lasts 5s
Regenerate 2% Health over 10s for every 150 Mod Power spent. Level 10: Allies within 15m are healed for 50% of the primary effect.
Increases Charge Speed of Bows and Fusion Rifles by 10%. Level 10: Charged Primary Shots of Bows and Fusion Rifles gain 15% Critical Chance.
Mod Use applies SLOW status on all enemies within 10m for 3.5s. Level 10: Increase this weapon's Ranged damage by 15% to enemies inflicted with SLOW status.

Increases this weapon's Ranged Damage by up to 7.5% based on how close the magazine capacity is to full. Level 10: Increases this weapon's Weakspot Damage by up to 20% based on how close the magazine capacity is to full.
Picking up Ammo increases Ranged damage by 10% for 15s. Level 10: Ammo pickups are added directly to into this weapon's magazine.
Increases Ranged damage of this weapon by 10% to BLEEDING targets. Level 10: This weapon's Ranged Weakspot and Ranged Critical Hits apply BLEEDING, dealing 200 BLEED damage over 20s.

The Awakened King.descricao: Increases Ranged Damage by 1% for every 5% of total Health present as Grey Health. Max 20% increase. Level 10: Increases Reload Speed for this weapon by 15% while Grey Health is present.

Increases Critical Chance of this weapon by 3% per unique Negative Status Effect on the enemy. Max 15% increase. Level 10: This weapon's Ranged Weakspot and Ranged Critical Hits apply CORRODED, dealing 75 CORROSIVE damage over 10s.

Increases this weapon‘s Elemental Damage by 5.5% for each unique Elemental Status Effect on the target. Level 10: Increases Mod Power Generation of Elemental Damage and Elemental Status damage by 20%.
Using this weapon's mod increases Mod Power Generation by 3% for 10s. Max 5 stacks. Level 10: Reduces Mod Power requirement of this weapon's mod by 10%.
This weapon becomes EMPOWERED when stowed for 5 seconds, granting 20% Critical Chance for 5 seconds after it is drawn. Level 10: While EMPOWERED, increases Critical Damage of this weapon by 15%.

The Forgotten Kingdom.descricao: Increases this weapon's Ranged and Mod Damage by 5% to enemies within 7m. Level 10: Activating this weapon's Mod triggers a fixed 7m blast, dealing 50 Explosive Damage per 100 Mod Power spent in a single cast. Inflicts 1.5 Stagger Damage.
Increases Ranged Damage of this weapon by 1.25% for every 2.5m from the shooter to the target. Max 25% Level 10: Increases this weapon's ideal, Falloff, and Max Range by 5m.
Increases Ranged damage of this weapon by 1% to BURNING targets. Level 10: This weapon's Ranged Weakspot and Ranged Critical Hits apply BURNING, dealing 50 FIRE damage over 5s.
Increases this weapon's Mod Damage and Mod Generation by 15% for l0s when activating a Skill. Level 10: Activating this weapon's Mod reduces Skill Cooldowns by 1% for every 100 Mod Power spent.
Increases this weapon's Critical Chance and Critical Damage by 0.1% for each shot fired. Lasts 0.125s. Max 50 stacks. Level 10: Increases this weapon's Reload Speed by 1% per stack.
Increases Ranged Damage of this weapon by 10% to enemies within 7m. Level 10: Increases ranged Critical Chance of this weapon by 10% to enemies within 7m.

The Dark Horizon.descricao: Increases this weapon's Fire Rate and Reload Speed by 2.5% per OVERLOADED entity within 15m. Max 5 stacks. Level 10: This weapon's Ranged Weakspot and Ranged Critical Hits apply OVERLOADED, dealing 75 SHOCK damage over 10s.
Each 10% of this weapon's magazine spent, cause an explosion for 5 Explosive Damage to targets within 0.5m of impact location. Level 10: Increases this weapon's explosive damage by 20%.
Increases the attached weapon's Ranged Damage by 15% after being stowed for 2s. Lasts 7s upon being brandished. Level 10: Automatically reloads the attached weapon after being stowed for 2s.

Spending 20% of this weapon's magazine grants a SHIELD for 5% of Max Health for 10s. Max 25% SHIELD. Level 10: Increases Ranged Critical Chance for this weapon by 10% when SHIELD is above 10% of Max Health.

Each enemy hit by Primary Fire grants 1 stack of REPERCUSSION, increasing Ranged Damage by 3% per stack. Max 5 stacks. Shots consume stacks. Level 10: Increases this weapon's Critical Chance by 3% per stack of REPERCUSSION.

When this weapon is above 25% Heat, a 7.5m Pulse deals 150 Explosive Damage once every 5s. Level 10: At Max Heat, a 10m Pulse deals 300 Explosive Damage which applies BURNING to all entities for 100 FIRE Damage over 20s. Can only happen once every 5s.
